original_text: You must also give them the first part of your grain, your wine and your olive oil. Give them the first wool that you cut from your sheep.
korean_text: 또 네가 처음 거둔 곡식과 포도주와 기름과 네가 처음 깎은 양털을 네가 그에게 줄 것이니

sentences.original_text: You must also give them the first part of your grain
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 또한 네 곡물의 첫 부분을 그들에게 주어야 한다

sentences.original_text: your wine and your olive oil
that you cut from your sheep
